description: Cover sheet for a new detached 600 sq ft ADU at 1222 N. Jefferson St., Placentia, CA 92870. Includes governing codes (2022 CBC/CRC/CMC/CPC/CEC/CalGreen/CFC), scope of work, separate permits list, 20 general notes, vicinity map, sheet index, project consultants, abbreviations, and project data.
key_content: Project type: New Detached ADU, 600 sq ft, 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom
Address: 1222 N. Jefferson St., Placentia, CA 92870
ADU address: 1222 N. Jefferson St., Unit 'A'
Governing codes: 2022 CBC, 2022 CRC, 2022 CMC, 2022 CPC, 2022 CEC, 2022 CalGreen, 2022 CFC, 2022 California Electrical Code, City of Placentia Municipal Code
PV solar: 22 panels at back of existing main home (265 Watts each)
Scope of work: new detached ADU at rear of property, wood frame construction

Separate permits required for: retaining walls, grading, swimming pool, separate structure, garage, driveway, water/gas, trash enclosure, pool/yard lighting, flagpole, concrete work, electrical/plumbing
General notes: 20 numbered items covering permits, worker's comp, OASYS/DITS, smoke/CO detectors, low-consumption fixtures, dust control, pre-construction meeting, storm drain discharge prohibition
Vicinity map showing N. Jefferson St. location in Placentia
NOT SHOWN: existing home square footage
NOT SHOWN: bedroom/bathroom count in project data section (stated in scope as 1BR/1BA)
